pictures.name: Starry Night
pictures.author: Vincent van Gogh
pictures.description: A famous oil painting of the night sky with swirling stars and a glowing moon.
pictures.location: Museum of Modern Art, New York City

pictures.name: The Persistence of Memory
pictures.author: Salvador Dali
pictures.description: A surrealist painting of melting clocks and a barren landscape.
pictures.location: Museum of Modern Art, New York City

pictures.name: Mona Lisa
pictures.author: Leonardo da Vinci
pictures.description: A portrait painting of a woman with a mysterious smile.

pictures.name: The Scream
pictures.author: Edvard Munch
pictures.description: A painting of a figure with an agonized expression against a blood-red sky.
